subject: SESSION HANDOFF - MapCenter fixes need TEST/PROD deploy
body:
## CONTEXT
Session reboot due to low context.

## COMPLETED
1. PROD deployed with appId filtering (e710778)
2. CLAUDE.md updated with correct inbox path
3. MapCenter.js fixes committed to DEVL (f5463aa):
   - Added appId to Joi schema
   - radiusMiles max: TT=200, HJ=2500

## PENDING - URGENT
1. Merge DEVL → TEST → PROD for MapCenter fixes
2. Git has CLAUDE.md case sensitivity issue - may need force checkout

## COMMANDS TO RUN
```bash
git checkout -f TEST
git merge DEVL -m 'Merge DEVL: MapCenter fixes'
git push origin TEST
git checkout PROD
git merge TEST -m 'Merge TEST: MapCenter fixes'
git push origin PROD
git checkout DEVL
```

## MESSAGES SENT
- To Sarah: PROD deployment confirmed
- To Ben: userlogins unique constraint issue (still open)

## MESSAGES FROM
- Cord: MapCenter fixes needed (DONE in DEVL)
- Sarah: PROD deployment status (REPLIED)

## JIRA
TIEMPO-322
